#summary How to install Debugger.

= Eclipse Debugger =

*Update site* is at http://chromedevtools.googlecode.com/svn/update/dev/. Additionally "update site in zip archive" is available on "Downloads" page.

Install "Chromium !JavaScript Remote Debugger" feature.

= SDK library alone =

SDK is available from "Downloads" section as "!ChromeDevTools SDK bundle". This is a tar archive of several jar-files. They have no dependencies on Eclipse.
